title: TOI
content:
Donald Trump threatens Spain with punitive tariffs over NATO spending defiance, calling Madrid "disrespectful" for refusing the 5% GDP defence target. The US President accused Spain of dragging its feet while other NATO members comply with new defence commitments. Trump hinted at trade retaliation and even expulsion from NATO. Spain stands firm, citing economic and industrial limitations. Tensions escalate within the alliance, as Europe struggles to meet U.S. demands. Will Madrid bow to pressure or face economic backlash?#Trump #Spain #NATO #Tariffs #USPolitics #DefenseSpending #PedroSanchez #BreakingNews

Bobby Deol has confirmed that his father, Dharmendra, is currently living at their Khandala farmhouse with his first wife, Prakash Kaur. He described their life there as peaceful and emotional, saying 'Papa and Mummy are together â€¦ they love being at the farmhouse'. The revelation reignites long-standing questions about his complex family dynamics.
